name: Software Issue
description: Issues related to software malfunctioning or errors.

name: Hardware Issue
description: Problems with physical components of devices.

name: Network Connectivity
description: Difficulties in connecting to the network.

name: System Crash
description: Unexpected shutdown or failure of a system.

name: Bug Report
description: Reporting bugs or glitches in the system.

name: Invoice Request
description: Request for a detailed bill or invoice.

name: Refund Request
description: Asking for money back for a service or product.

name: Account Setup
description: Help with setting up a new account.

name: Password Reset
description: Assistance with resetting a forgotten password.

name: Account Lockout
description: Unable to access account due to lockout.

name: Profile Update
description: Changes or updates to profile information.

name: Feature Request
description: Suggestions for new features or improvements.

name: Availability Check
description: Inquiring about the availability of a product.

name: Order Status
description: Checking the status of an order.

name: Return/Exchange Request
description: Request to return or exchange a product.

name: Lost/Damaged Order
description: Report of lost or damaged order.

name: Installation Request
description: Request for installation of a product or service.

name: Upgrade Request
description: Request to upgrade a product or service.

name: Training Request
description: Request for training on a product or service.
